content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Holy scientific is leading manufacturer of U.V. cabinet in india

Rasayan U.V. cabinet is useful for inspect thin layer chromatography in under different U.V. light in absence of ambient light.

[/vc_column_text]

consist of :
  • Unit made out of M.S. sheet duly powder coated.
  • Lights:
  • 8 watt Long wave U.V. light
  • 8 watt Shortwave U.V. light
  • 8 watt Florcoscent light
  • Individual switches for all lights.
  • V. resistant polycarbonate made view port.
  • Detachable power supply cable
  • Power supply: 230 volts, 50 hz, single phase.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”616″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_border” image_hovers=”false”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
